description: Triangular array in which k-th entry in n-th row is C([ (n+k)/2 ],k) (1<=k<=n).
comments: Same as A046854, but missing the initial column of ones.Riordan array (1/((1-x)(1-x^2)),x/(1-x^2)). Diagonal sums are A052551. - _Paul Barry_, Sep 30 2006
formula: G.f.: 1 / (1 - x - xy - x^2 + x^2y + x^3). - _Ralf Stephan_, Feb 13 2005Sum(k=1, n, C([ (n+k)/2 ], k)) = F(n+2)-1 where F(n) is the n-th Fibonacci number - _Benoit Cloitre_, Oct 07 2002
prog: (PARI) {T(n, k) = binomial((n+k)\2, k)}; /* _Michael Somos_, Jul 23 1999 */(PARI) printp(matrix(8,8,n,k,binomial((n+k)\2,k)))(PARI) for(n=1,7, for(k=1,n,print1(binomial((n+k)\2,k)); if(k==n,print1("; ")); print1(" ")))
author: Jacques Haubrich (jhaubrich(AT)freeler.nl)
extensions: Corrected and extended by _Harvey P. Dale_, Jun 03 2014
